DOC.brief_summary: 2-4 6MWT performed but with alternative wording and coaching in random order to determine differences in outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: The Six Minute Walk Test: Influence of Patient Effort on Results and Interpretation
DOC.criteria: advanced lung disease such as COPD, ILD, IPF, or PAH inability to walk, requiring supplemental oxygen, cardiac disease preventing successful 6MWT
